# üéØ Workflow: Recherche de Stage √† l'√âtranger

## Vue d'ensemble. 

Ce workflow automatise la recherche de stages en combinant **villes √ó technologies**, puis enrichit les r√©sultats avec un scoring et des analyses LLM.

#
---

## üìã √âtapes du workflow

| # | √âtape | Description |
|---|-------|-------------|
| 1 | **Code JS** | G√©n√©rer les combinaisons Villes √ó Technologies |
| 2 | **Tavily API** | Rechercher les offres de stage |
| 3 | **R√©sultats** | R√©cup√©rer le Top 5 par recherche |
| 4 | **MCP Server** | Scorer les villes |
| 5 | **Filtrage** | Appliquer vos crit√®res personnalis√©s |
| 6 | **LLM Extraction** | Extraire infos cl√©s (date, salaire, comp√©tences) |
| 7 | **LLM R√©sum√©** | G√©n√©rer description courte |
| 8 | **Export CSV** | Sauvegarder les r√©sultats |
| 9 | **LLM Synth√®se** | Cr√©er un rapport r√©capitulatif |
| 10 | **Notification** | Envoyer alerte (Email/Slack/Discord) |

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Configuration requise

### APIs n√©cessaires
- [ ] **Tavily** : Cl√© API pour la recherche web
- [ ] **LLM** : OpenAI / Gemini / Mistral (au choix)
- [ ] **MCP Server** : Votre serveur de scoring (Partie 1)

### Variables √† personnaliser
```
TAVILY_API_KEY=votre_cle_tavily
LLM_API_KEY=votre_cle_llm
MCP_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:3000
```

---

## üèôÔ∏è Villes & Technologies

### Villes (√† adapter)
- Berlin, New York, Barcelona
- *Ajoutez vos villes pr√©f√©r√©es*

### Technologies (√† adapter)
- crypto, devops, cybersecurity, iot
- *Ajoutez vos domaines d'int√©r√™t*

---

## üîç Crit√®res de filtrage sugg√©r√©s

- Score ville minimum
- Stage r√©mun√©r√© uniquement
- Dur√©e de stage compatible
- Pertinence du r√©sultat
- Date de d√©but souhait√©e

---

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Gestion des erreurs

√Ä impl√©menter en autonomie :
- API timeout / rate limiting
- Villes non trouv√©es dans le dataset
- R√©sultats vides
- Parsing LLM √©chou√©

---

## üì§ Format de sortie attendu

```json
{
  "city": "Berlin",
  "city_score": 85,
  "technology": "devops",
  "company": "Nom Entreprise",
  "title": "DevOps Intern",
  "url": "https://...",
  "deadline": "2026-03-15",
  "salary": "1200‚Ç¨/mois",
  "duration": "6 mois",
  "skills": ["Docker", "K8s", "CI/CD"],
  "summary": "Description courte..."
}
```

---

## ‚úÖ Checklist avant rendu

- [ ] Toutes les combinaisons sont g√©n√©r√©es
- [ ] Tavily retourne des r√©sultats pertinents
- [ ] Scoring MCP fonctionne
- [ ] Extraction LLM correcte
- [ ] Filtrage actif
- [ ] CSV bien format√©
- [ ] Notification re√ßue
- [ ] Workflow export√© en JSON

---

## DevOps Engineer: chi √® e cosa fa

Il termine "DevOps" √® una combinazione delle parole "Sviluppo" (Dev) e "Operativo" (Ops). DevOps engineer √® dunque una/un professionista che opera tra questi due mondi, fungendo da "ponte" e garantendo che l'intero processo di creazione del software avvenga in modo fluido e coordinato. Ha profonde competenze dell'architettura, del provisioning e dell'amministrazione di sistema, ma anche esperienza con il set di strumenti e le pratiche di sviluppo tradizionali, ad esempio l'uso del controllo del codice sorgente, la fornitura e la ricezione di revisioni del codice, la scrittura di test unitari e familiarit√† con i principi Agile.

We are looking for a Software Engineering Intern to join our Engineering Department in Milano.  
  
Join 2000+ people building solutions used by 80 million patients across Europe

Your code will directly impact healthcare for millions - see real usage within weeks of deployment [...] As a Software Engineering Intern, your mission will be to work on building innovative products and features that improve the daily lives of care teams and patients. You will be working in a feature team developing solutions that directly impact healthcare professionals and millions of patients by creating our Operating System powered by AI to manage all their clinical and administrative activities.

Working in the tech team at Doctolib involves building innovative products and features to improve the daily lives of care teams and patients. We work in feature teams in an agile environment, while collaborating with product, design, and business teams.

### Program Highlights

 Internship Placements: CIEE offers the largest inventory of internship placements that align with your career aspirations.
 Elective Courses: Choose from in-person courses at CIEE Milan that align with your academic major.
 Workshops: Enhance your resume and interview skills while immersing yourself in Italian business culture through an internship and workshops that build practical skills, foster cultural competence, and expand your network.
 Company Visits: Visit a digitally native company, a consulting firm, or a local non-profit foundation to gain an in-depth understanding of the work environment in Milan.

### Excursions & Activities [...] #### Application Deadline

Apply Now

Request Information

Your CIEE Summer Intern and Study Abroad program in Milan lasts 6 weeks and features three key components: A part-time internship with an international organization (15-20 hours per week), an internship seminar, and a 3- or 4-credit academic course taught by CIEE faculty. Enhance your experience with cultural and extracurricular activities while building career skills, expanding your professional network, and immersing yourself in Italian culture. Live, learn, and work in Milan!

of an innovative fashion agency

of a temporary lodge for travelers and tourists [...] Standard Housing: Includes a double room in an apartment or residence hall. Apartments and residence halls feature furnished double rooms, with shared kitchen and bathrooms, and are located within 45 minutes from the CIEE center.

Select Housing: Includes a single room in an apartment or residence hall. Both apartments and residence halls feature furnished single rooms, with shared kitchen and bathrooms,  and are located within 45 minutes from the CIEE center.

results.title: Tirocini per studenti | Amazon.jobs
results.content:
# Tirocini per studenti

## 351 opportunit√† di lavoro disponibili

## Informazioni

Se stai conseguendo una laurea triennale, una laurea magistrale, un master o un dottorato di ricerca, i team Amazon hanno delle posizioni aperte in tutto il mondo. Sebbene offriamo degli stage durante tutto l'anno, la maggior parte dei nostri tirocini tecnici si svolgono in estate e hanno una durata compresa tra le 12 e le 16 settimane. I tirocini sono un ottimo modo per immergersi nella cultura di Amazon, per vedere se siamo adatti a te e ai tuoi obiettivi di carriera. [...] TUTORAGGIO

Offriamo ai nostri tirocinanti molte opportunit√† per partecipare alla costruzione del futuro per i clienti Amazon. Inventare pu√≤ essere un lavoro duro: sappiamo che c‚Äô√® molto che possiamo migliorare e troviamo le tante sfide e opportunit√† che ci aspettano terribilmente rinvigorenti. Per questo motivo, forniamo a ogni tirocinante un mentore e un manager che lavoreranno per promuovere il suo successo e contribuiranno a facilitare la sua crescita professionale. Tali partner fungeranno da guida sui progetti, offriranno il loro feedback sui risultati chiave e si promuoveranno per rimuovere eventuali barriere. Alcuni dei nostri leader pi√π anziani hanno iniziato come tirocinanti, e per noi questo programma √® un‚Äôimportante opportunit√† per scoprire nuovi talenti.

FORMAZIONE [...] ## Tipologie di tirocini

Settore tecnico e ingegneristico: Per gli studenti che devono conseguire una laurea tecnica, Amazon offre diversi tipi di tirocini. Queste opportunit√† possono spaziare dalla costruzione di tecnologie innovative in ambienti di calcolo distribuiti di grandi dimensioni alla progettazione di prodotti di consumo.

Settore di ricerca: I tirocinanti per dottorati di ricerca e master contribuiscono a risolvere un variegato insieme di problemi tecnici attraverso piattaforme su larga scala, utilizzando l‚Äôapprendimento automatico, grandi collezioni di dati e il cloud computing. Questi tirocinanti aiutano a scrivere algoritmi innovativi che modellano le strutture all'interno dei dati per guidare decisioni automatizzate su larga scala per tutti i dipartimenti dell'azienda.

results.title: Cloud Consultant Intern, National Security, AWS Professional Services
results.content: Amazon Web Services (AWS), a leader in Cloud Computing, is seeking interns to join our AWS Professional Services Internship program. The AWS Professional Services organization is a global team of experts that helps AWS customers realize their desired business outcomes when using the AWS Cloud. As a Professional Services intern, you will gain hands-on experience in cloud computing, develop business acumen, and learn about Amazon‚Äôs peculiar culture. Upon successful completion of the internship program, selected interns may receive a full-time offer to join the Professional Services and go into our Associate to Consultant (A2C) team. This team provides an onboarding program that accelerates career development program for recent graduates and early career professionals entering technical roles to advance their skills and help customers design and build flexible and resilient cloud-based solutions. While in this program, you will learn key technical and professional skills from top AWS subject matter experts that you can use in your career working with AWS‚Äôs customers.

results.title: An Open-label Study Comparing Lutetium (177Lu) Vipivotide ...
results.content: An International, Prospective, Open-label, Multi-center, Randomized Phase III Study Comparing Lutetium (177Lu) Vipivotide Tetraxetan (AAA617) Versus Observation to Delay Castration or Disease Recurrence in Adult Male Patients With Prostate-specific Membrane Antigen (PSMA) Positive Oligometastatic Prostate Cancer (OMPC). All participants will be assessed for eligibility and will undergo baseline disease assessments including a mandatory gallium (68Ga) gozetotide (also known as \[68Ga\]Ga-PSMA-11) or piflufolastat (18F) ( also known as\[18F\]DCFPyL) PET/CT scan and CI (i.e., CT/MRI and bone scans). 3. Participants must have OMPC with 1-5 PSMA -positive metastatic lesions on screening PSMA PET/CT scan (with either gallium (68Ga) gozetotide or piflufolastat (18F)) as visually assessed by BIRC. \* For a participant not to be eligible, CI positive M1 lesions should be unequivocal in CI scans, i.e., potentially not attributable to findings thought to represent something other than tumor (e.g., degenerative, or post-traumatic changes or Paget's disease in bone lesions).

# About Milan

## What's good to know

The offices in Milan are located in the Porta Nuova business district on Viale Monte Grappa, reachable by a short walk from Garibaldi Station. The area is well connected to the city airports, as well as subway lines and stations, and to the surroundings and the main Italian cities.

Since opening the new offices Milan in late 2017, the Corporate office has created hundreds of permanent jobs and is still growing. The office employs professionals in specialist and managerial roles. [...] ## Find jobs in Milan, Italy

##### b2tlUE0wV28zaFpyL2o0NXc5TGdDNW9nTVE9PQ==

 Atropos Health
 Remote

### Job Description

## About Atropos Health

Atropos Health is the developer of GENEVA‚Ñ¢ OS , the operating system for rapid healthcare evidence across a robust network of real-world data. Healthcare and life science organizations work with Atropos Health to close evidence gaps from bench to bedside, improving individual patient outcomes with data-driven care, expediting research that advances the field of medicine, and more. We aim to transform healthcare with timely, relevant real-world evidence.

## About the Role [...] ### Minimum Qualifications

 1-2 years of experience in an IT support role or relevant internships.
 Basic understanding of computer hardware, software, and networking concepts.
 Exposure to or interest in DevOps principles and practices.
 Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) is a plus.
 Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
 Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical users.
 Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
 Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
 Willingness to learn new technologies and adapt to a rapidly evolving environment.

### Reporting

The IT & Infrastructure Associate  reports directly to the DevOps Manager, David Bogen .

results.title: Associate Professional Services Consultant Intern 2026 - Amazon.jobs
results.content:
Do you want to experiment with innovative technologies, including Cloud Computing, Machine Learning, and GenAI? Are you passionate about educating, training, designing, and building cloud computing solutions to help customer solve their most challenging problems? Amazon Web Services (AWS), a leader in Cloud Computing, is seeking interns to join our AWS Professional Services Internship program. This is a unique opportunity to play a key role in a fast-growing business and to deliver value to AWS customers of all sizes from startups to global brands. The skills and experiences you gain will be highly sought after throughout the industry and give you the opportunity for the career of a lifetime. The AWS Professional Services organization is a global team of experts that helps AWS customers [...] 75% travel associated. While many of our customers engage ProServe virtually, there is always the potential that a customer might choose to include travel in their contract. Upon successful completion of the internship program, selected interns will receive a full-time offer to join the Professional Services and go into our AWS Technical training program. This program is an accelerated career development program for recent graduates and early career professionals entering technical roles to advance their skills and help customers design and build flexible and resilient cloud-based solutions. While in this program, you will learn key technical and professional skills from top AWS subject matter experts that you can use in your career working with AWS‚Äôs customers. [...] - Experience with software development lifecycle (SDLC) and agile/iterative methodologies  
- Knowledge of the primary AWS services such as EC2, ELB, RDS, VPC, Route53, and S3  
- Basic experience setting up cloud environment with AWS  
- Experience with infrastructure as code, ops automation, and configuration management tools such as Chef, Puppet, or Ansible

## DevOps Engineer: chi √® e cosa fa

Il termine "DevOps" √® una combinazione delle parole "Sviluppo" (Dev) e "Operativo" (Ops). DevOps engineer √® dunque una/un professionista che opera tra questi due mondi, fungendo da "ponte" e garantendo che l'intero processo di creazione del software avvenga in modo fluido e coordinato. Ha profonde competenze dell'architettura, del provisioning e dell'amministrazione di sistema, ma anche esperienza con il set di strumenti e le pratiche di sviluppo tradizionali, ad esempio l'uso del controllo del codice sorgente, la fornitura e la ricezione di revisioni del codice, la scrittura di test unitari e familiarit√† con i principi Agile.

## Join our mission, join Doctolib!

We are looking for a Software Engineering Intern to join our Engineering Department in Milano.  
  
Join 2000+ people building solutions used by 80 million patients across Europe

Your code will directly impact healthcare for millions - see real usage within weeks of deployment [...] As a Software Engineering Intern, your mission will be to work on building innovative products and features that improve the daily lives of care teams and patients. You will be working in a feature team developing solutions that directly impact healthcare professionals and millions of patients by creating our Operating System powered by AI to manage all their clinical and administrative activities.

Working in the tech team at Doctolib involves building innovative products and features to improve the daily lives of care teams and patients. We work in feature teams in an agile environment, while collaborating with product, design, and business teams.

Your responsibilities include but are not limited to: [...] Your responsibilities include but are not limited to:

 Build and own features alongside experienced engineers to design, develop, test, and ship features that impact real users
 Collaborate across teams with engineers, product managers and designers to solve complex technical challenges and build scalable, secure, and user-friendly healthcare tools
 Write clean, efficient code following industry best practices in design, testing, and peer review
 Solve real-world problems that directly enhance patient care and improve doctor-patient relationships
 Continuous learning by exploring new tools and diving into areas like AI and distributed systems
 Living Doctolib Playbook!

About our tech environment

results.content:
### Program Highlights

 Internship Placements: CIEE offers the largest inventory of internship placements that align with your career aspirations.
 Elective Courses: Choose from in-person courses at CIEE Milan that align with your academic major.
 Workshops: Enhance your resume and interview skills while immersing yourself in Italian business culture through an internship and workshops that build practical skills, foster cultural competence, and expand your network.
 Company Visits: Visit a digitally native company, a consulting firm, or a local non-profit foundation to gain an in-depth understanding of the work environment in Milan.

### Excursions & Activities [...] #### Application Deadline

Apply Now

Request Information

Your CIEE Summer Intern and Study Abroad program in Milan lasts 6 weeks and features three key components: A part-time internship with an international organization (15-20 hours per week), an internship seminar, and a 3- or 4-credit academic course taught by CIEE faculty. Enhance your experience with cultural and extracurricular activities while building career skills, expanding your professional network, and immersing yourself in Italian culture. Live, learn, and work in Milan!

## Unique Experiences

### Create engaging content to promote the brand

of an innovative fashion agency

### Welcome guests, manage reservations, and serve the kitchen

of a temporary lodge for travelers and tourists [...] Standard Housing: Includes a double room in an apartment or residence hall. Apartments and residence halls feature furnished double rooms, with shared kitchen and bathrooms, and are located within 45 minutes from the CIEE center.

Select Housing: Includes a single room in an apartment or residence hall. Both apartments and residence halls feature furnished single rooms, with shared kitchen and bathrooms,  and are located within 45 minutes from the CIEE center.   
   
A note: The default criterion to assign housing is first-come, first-served; however, other factors may also be considered. If we cannot accommodate your first housing choice, we'll let you know before you arrive.

 Apartments: Meals are not included

results.title: Tirocini per studenti | Amazon.jobs
results.content:
# Tirocini per studenti

## 351 opportunit√† di lavoro disponibili

## Informazioni

Se stai conseguendo una laurea triennale, una laurea magistrale, un master o un dottorato di ricerca, i team Amazon hanno delle posizioni aperte in tutto il mondo. Sebbene offriamo degli stage durante tutto l'anno, la maggior parte dei nostri tirocini tecnici si svolgono in estate e hanno una durata compresa tra le 12 e le 16 settimane. I tirocini sono un ottimo modo per immergersi nella cultura di Amazon, per vedere se siamo adatti a te e ai tuoi obiettivi di carriera. [...] TUTORAGGIO

Offriamo ai nostri tirocinanti molte opportunit√† per partecipare alla costruzione del futuro per i clienti Amazon. Inventare pu√≤ essere un lavoro duro: sappiamo che c‚Äô√® molto che possiamo migliorare e troviamo le tante sfide e opportunit√† che ci aspettano terribilmente rinvigorenti. Per questo motivo, forniamo a ogni tirocinante un mentore e un manager che lavoreranno per promuovere il suo successo e contribuiranno a facilitare la sua crescita professionale. Tali partner fungeranno da guida sui progetti, offriranno il loro feedback sui risultati chiave e si promuoveranno per rimuovere eventuali barriere. Alcuni dei nostri leader pi√π anziani hanno iniziato come tirocinanti, e per noi questo programma √® un‚Äôimportante opportunit√† per scoprire nuovi talenti.

FORMAZIONE [...] ## Tipologie di tirocini

Settore tecnico e ingegneristico: Per gli studenti che devono conseguire una laurea tecnica, Amazon offre diversi tipi di tirocini. Queste opportunit√† possono spaziare dalla costruzione di tecnologie innovative in ambienti di calcolo distribuiti di grandi dimensioni alla progettazione di prodotti di consumo.

Settore di ricerca: I tirocinanti per dottorati di ricerca e master contribuiscono a risolvere un variegato insieme di problemi tecnici attraverso piattaforme su larga scala, utilizzando l‚Äôapprendimento automatico, grandi collezioni di dati e il cloud computing. Questi tirocinanti aiutano a scrivere algoritmi innovativi che modellano le strutture all'interno dei dati per guidare decisioni automatizzate su larga scala per tutti i dipartimenti dell'azienda.

results.title: Cloud Consultant Intern, National Security, AWS Professional Services
results.content: Amazon Web Services (AWS), a leader in Cloud Computing, is seeking interns to join our AWS Professional Services Internship program. The AWS Professional Services organization is a global team of experts that helps AWS customers realize their desired business outcomes when using the AWS Cloud. As a Professional Services intern, you will gain hands-on experience in cloud computing, develop business acumen, and learn about Amazon‚Äôs peculiar culture. Upon successful completion of the internship program, selected interns may receive a full-time offer to join the Professional Services and go into our Associate to Consultant (A2C) team. This team provides an onboarding program that accelerates career development program for recent graduates and early career professionals entering technical roles to advance their skills and help customers design and build flexible and resilient cloud-based solutions. While in this program, you will learn key technical and professional skills from top AWS subject matter experts that you can use in your career working with AWS‚Äôs customers.

results.title: An Open-label Study Comparing Lutetium (177Lu) Vipivotide ...
results.content: An International, Prospective, Open-label, Multi-center, Randomized Phase III Study Comparing Lutetium (177Lu) Vipivotide Tetraxetan (AAA617) Versus Observation to Delay Castration or Disease Recurrence in Adult Male Patients With Prostate-specific Membrane Antigen (PSMA) Positive Oligometastatic Prostate Cancer (OMPC). All participants will be assessed for eligibility and will undergo baseline disease assessments including a mandatory gallium (68Ga) gozetotide (also known as \[68Ga\]Ga-PSMA-11) or piflufolastat (18F) ( also known as\[18F\]DCFPyL) PET/CT scan and CI (i.e., CT/MRI and bone scans). 3. Participants must have OMPC with 1-5 PSMA -positive metastatic lesions on screening PSMA PET/CT scan (with either gallium (68Ga) gozetotide or piflufolastat (18F)) as visually assessed by BIRC. \* For a participant not to be eligible, CI positive M1 lesions should be unequivocal in CI scans, i.e., potentially not attributable to findings thought to represent something other than tumor (e.g., degenerative, or post-traumatic changes or Paget's disease in bone lesions).

# About Milan

## What's good to know

The offices in Milan are located in the Porta Nuova business district on Viale Monte Grappa, reachable by a short walk from Garibaldi Station. The area is well connected to the city airports, as well as subway lines and stations, and to the surroundings and the main Italian cities.

##### b2tlUE0wV28zaFpyL2o0NXc5TGdDNW9nTVE9PQ==

 Atropos Health
 Remote

### Job Description

## About Atropos Health

Atropos Health is the developer of GENEVA‚Ñ¢ OS , the operating system for rapid healthcare evidence across a robust network of real-world data. Healthcare and life science organizations work with Atropos Health to close evidence gaps from bench to bedside, improving individual patient outcomes with data-driven care, expediting research that advances the field of medicine, and more. We aim to transform healthcare with timely, relevant real-world evidence.

## About the Role [...] ### Minimum Qualifications

 1-2 years of experience in an IT support role or relevant internships.
 Basic understanding of computer hardware, software, and networking concepts.
 Exposure to or interest in DevOps principles and practices.
 Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) is a plus.
 Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
 Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical users.
 Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
 Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
 Willingness to learn new technologies and adapt to a rapidly evolving environment.

### Reporting

The IT & Infrastructure Associate  reports directly to the DevOps Manager, David Bogen .

results.title: Associate Professional Services Consultant Intern 2026 - Amazon.jobs
results.content:
Do you want to experiment with innovative technologies, including Cloud Computing, Machine Learning, and GenAI? Are you passionate about educating, training, designing, and building cloud computing solutions to help customer solve their most challenging problems? Amazon Web Services (AWS), a leader in Cloud Computing, is seeking interns to join our AWS Professional Services Internship program. This is a unique opportunity to play a key role in a fast-growing business and to deliver value to AWS customers of all sizes from startups to global brands. The skills and experiences you gain will be highly sought after throughout the industry and give you the opportunity for the career of a lifetime. The AWS Professional Services organization is a global team of experts that helps AWS customers [...] 75% travel associated. While many of our customers engage ProServe virtually, there is always the potential that a customer might choose to include travel in their contract. Upon successful completion of the internship program, selected interns will receive a full-time offer to join the Professional Services and go into our AWS Technical training program. This program is an accelerated career development program for recent graduates and early career professionals entering technical roles to advance their skills and help customers design and build flexible and resilient cloud-based solutions. While in this program, you will learn key technical and professional skills from top AWS subject matter experts that you can use in your career working with AWS‚Äôs customers. [...] - Experience with software development lifecycle (SDLC) and agile/iterative methodologies  
- Knowledge of the primary AWS services such as EC2, ELB, RDS, VPC, Route53, and S3  
- Basic experience setting up cloud environment with AWS  
- Experience with infrastructure as code, ops automation, and configuration management tools such as Chef, Puppet, or Ansible

json.title: Offerte di lavoro per Devops Engineer - Experis
json.content:
## Dove lavorare come DevOps engineer

La domanda di ingegneri e ingegnere DevOps √® in forte crescita. Sono soprattutto le aziende strutturate che necessitano di soluzioni per progetti complessi a richiedere questa figura ma, in generale, qualsiasi realt√† che operi nel settore informatico o meno, per essere competitiva sul mercato, ha bisogno di una/o o pi√π DevOps Engineer. Questo profilo √® molto richiesto nelle citt√† di Milano, Roma e Bologna che, sommate insieme, coprono oltre la met√† delle offerte di lavoro in Italia.

## Stipendio medio DevOps engineer [...] ## Stipendio medio DevOps engineer

Il mercato offre retribuzioni competitive per le/i DevOps Engineer. La RAL per un profilo di media seniority raggiunge i 45.000‚Ç¨ nelle citt√† di Milano, Udine e Verona, mentre si abbassa a 32.000‚Ç¨ nelle citt√† di Bari e Napoli. In Veneto, si registra un massimo nella provincia di Padova, dove la RAL raggiunge i 41.000‚Ç¨.

## Studi e formazione

Per diventare DevOps Engineer √® essenziale una formazione specifica in ambito informatico, spesso tramite corsi di formazione specialistici o con un percorso accademico nel settore. Molti iniziano la carriera sotto la supervisione di una figura senior, acquisendo con il tempo conoscenze, esperienze e responsabilit√†.

Scopri le posizioni aperte per il ruolo di‚ÄØDevOps engineer nel nostro sito! [...] Aerospace e Defence

## DevOps Engineer: chi √® e cosa fa

Il termine "DevOps" √® una combinazione delle parole "Sviluppo" (Dev) e "Operativo" (Ops). DevOps engineer √® dunque una/un professionista che opera tra questi due mondi, fungendo da "ponte" e garantendo che l'intero processo di creazione del software avvenga in modo fluido e coordinato. Ha profonde competenze dell'architettura, del provisioning e dell'amministrazione di sistema, ma anche esperienza con il set di strumenti e le pratiche di sviluppo tradizionali, ad esempio l'uso del controllo del codice sorgente, la fornitura e la ricezione di revisioni del codice, la scrittura di test unitari e familiarit√† con i principi Agile.

## Join our mission, join Doctolib!

We are looking for a Software Engineering Intern to join our Engineering Department in Milano.  
  
Join 2000+ people building solutions used by 80 million patients across Europe

Your code will directly impact healthcare for millions - see real usage within weeks of deployment [...] As a Software Engineering Intern, your mission will be to work on building innovative products and features that improve the daily lives of care teams and patients. You will be working in a feature team developing solutions that directly impact healthcare professionals and millions of patients by creating our Operating System powered by AI to manage all their clinical and administrative activities.

Working in the tech team at Doctolib involves building innovative products and features to improve the daily lives of care teams and patients. We work in feature teams in an agile environment, while collaborating with product, design, and business teams.

Your responsibilities include but are not limited to: [...] Your responsibilities include but are not limited to:

 Build and own features alongside experienced engineers to design, develop, test, and ship features that impact real users
 Collaborate across teams with engineers, product managers and designers to solve complex technical challenges and build scalable, secure, and user-friendly healthcare tools
 Write clean, efficient code following industry best practices in design, testing, and peer review
 Solve real-world problems that directly enhance patient care and improve doctor-patient relationships
 Continuous learning by exploring new tools and diving into areas like AI and distributed systems

json.title: Tirocini per studenti | Amazon.jobs
json.content:
# Tirocini per studenti

## 351 opportunit√† di lavoro disponibili

## Informazioni

Se stai conseguendo una laurea triennale, una laurea magistrale, un master o un dottorato di ricerca, i team Amazon hanno delle posizioni aperte in tutto il mondo. Sebbene offriamo degli stage durante tutto l'anno, la maggior parte dei nostri tirocini tecnici si svolgono in estate e hanno una durata compresa tra le 12 e le 16 settimane. I tirocini sono un ottimo modo per immergersi nella cultura di Amazon, per vedere se siamo adatti a te e ai tuoi obiettivi di carriera. [...] TUTORAGGIO

Offriamo ai nostri tirocinanti molte opportunit√† per partecipare alla costruzione del futuro per i clienti Amazon. Inventare pu√≤ essere un lavoro duro: sappiamo che c‚Äô√® molto che possiamo migliorare e troviamo le tante sfide e opportunit√† che ci aspettano terribilmente rinvigorenti. Per questo motivo, forniamo a ogni tirocinante un mentore e un manager che lavoreranno per promuovere il suo successo e contribuiranno a facilitare la sua crescita professionale. Tali partner fungeranno da guida sui progetti, offriranno il loro feedback sui risultati chiave e si promuoveranno per rimuovere eventuali barriere. Alcuni dei nostri leader pi√π anziani hanno iniziato come tirocinanti, e per noi questo programma √® un‚Äôimportante opportunit√† per scoprire nuovi talenti.

FORMAZIONE [...] ## Tipologie di tirocini

Settore tecnico e ingegneristico: Per gli studenti che devono conseguire una laurea tecnica, Amazon offre diversi tipi di tirocini. Queste opportunit√† possono spaziare dalla costruzione di tecnologie innovative in ambienti di calcolo distribuiti di grandi dimensioni alla progettazione di prodotti di consumo.

Settore di ricerca: I tirocinanti per dottorati di ricerca e master contribuiscono a risolvere un variegato insieme di problemi tecnici attraverso piattaforme su larga scala, utilizzando l‚Äôapprendimento automatico, grandi collezioni di dati e il cloud computing. Questi tirocinanti aiutano a scrivere algoritmi innovativi che modellano le strutture all'interno dei dati per guidare decisioni automatizzate su larga scala per tutti i dipartimenti dell'azienda.

## Stipendio medio DevOps engineer

Il mercato offre retribuzioni competitive per le/i DevOps Engineer. La RAL per un profilo di media seniority raggiunge i 45.000‚Ç¨ nelle citt√† di Milano, Udine e Verona, mentre si abbassa a 32.000‚Ç¨ nelle citt√† di Bari e Napoli. In Veneto, si registra un massimo nella provincia di Padova, dove la RAL raggiunge i 41.000‚Ç¨.

## Studi e formazione

Per diventare DevOps Engineer √® essenziale una formazione specifica in ambito informatico, spesso tramite corsi di formazione specialistici o con un percorso accademico nel settore. Molti iniziano la carriera sotto la supervisione di una figura senior, acquisendo con il tempo conoscenze, esperienze e responsabilit√†.

Scopri le posizioni aperte per il ruolo di‚ÄØDevOps engineer nel nostro sito! [...] ## Dove lavorare come DevOps engineer

La domanda di ingegneri e ingegnere DevOps √® in forte crescita. Sono soprattutto le aziende strutturate che necessitano di soluzioni per progetti complessi a richiedere questa figura ma, in generale, qualsiasi realt√† che operi nel settore informatico o meno, per essere competitiva sul mercato, ha bisogno di una/o o pi√π DevOps Engineer. Questo profilo √® molto richiesto nelle citt√† di Milano, Roma e Bologna che, sommate insieme, coprono oltre la met√† delle offerte di lavoro in Italia.

json.title: Cloud Consultant Intern, National Security, AWS Professional Services
json.content: Amazon Web Services (AWS), a leader in Cloud Computing, is seeking interns to join our AWS Professional Services Internship program. The AWS Professional Services organization is a global team of experts that helps AWS customers realize their desired business outcomes when using the AWS Cloud. As a Professional Services intern, you will gain hands-on experience in cloud computing, develop business acumen, and learn about Amazon‚Äôs peculiar culture. Upon successful completion of the internship program, selected interns may receive a full-time offer to join the Professional Services and go into our Associate to Consultant (A2C) team. This team provides an onboarding program that accelerates career development program for recent graduates and early career professionals entering technical roles to advance their skills and help customers design and build flexible and resilient cloud-based solutions. While in this program, you will learn key technical and professional skills from top AWS subject matter experts that you can use in your career working with AWS‚Äôs customers.

json.title: An Open-label Study Comparing Lutetium (177Lu) Vipivotide ...
json.content: An International, Prospective, Open-label, Multi-center, Randomized Phase III Study Comparing Lutetium (177Lu) Vipivotide Tetraxetan (AAA617) Versus Observation to Delay Castration or Disease Recurrence in Adult Male Patients With Prostate-specific Membrane Antigen (PSMA) Positive Oligometastatic Prostate Cancer (OMPC). All participants will be assessed for eligibility and will undergo baseline disease assessments including a mandatory gallium (68Ga) gozetotide (also known as \[68Ga\]Ga-PSMA-11) or piflufolastat (18F) ( also known as\[18F\]DCFPyL) PET/CT scan and CI (i.e., CT/MRI and bone scans). 3. Participants must have OMPC with 1-5 PSMA -positive metastatic lesions on screening PSMA PET/CT scan (with either gallium (68Ga) gozetotide or piflufolastat (18F)) as visually assessed by BIRC. \* For a participant not to be eligible, CI positive M1 lesions should be unequivocal in CI scans, i.e., potentially not attributable to findings thought to represent something other than tumor (e.g., degenerative, or post-traumatic changes or Paget's disease in bone lesions).

### Job Description

## About Atropos Health

Atropos Health is the developer of GENEVA‚Ñ¢ OS , the operating system for rapid healthcare evidence across a robust network of real-world data. Healthcare and life science organizations work with Atropos Health to close evidence gaps from bench to bedside, improving individual patient outcomes with data-driven care, expediting research that advances the field of medicine, and more. We aim to transform healthcare with timely, relevant real-world evidence.

## About the Role [...] ### Minimum Qualifications

 1-2 years of experience in an IT support role or relevant internships.
 Basic understanding of computer hardware, software, and networking concepts.
 Exposure to or interest in DevOps principles and practices.
 Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) is a plus.
 Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
 Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical users.
 Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
 Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
 Willingness to learn new technologies and adapt to a rapidly evolving environment.

### Reporting

The IT & Infrastructure Associate  reports directly to the DevOps Manager, David Bogen .

json.title: Associate Professional Services Consultant Intern 2026 - Amazon.jobs
json.content:
Do you want to experiment with innovative technologies, including Cloud Computing, Machine Learning, and GenAI? Are you passionate about educating, training, designing, and building cloud computing solutions to help customer solve their most challenging problems? Amazon Web Services (AWS), a leader in Cloud Computing, is seeking interns to join our AWS Professional Services Internship program. This is a unique opportunity to play a key role in a fast-growing business and to deliver value to AWS customers of all sizes from startups to global brands. The skills and experiences you gain will be highly sought after throughout the industry and give you the opportunity for the career of a lifetime. The AWS Professional Services organization is a global team of experts that helps AWS customers [...] 75% travel associated. While many of our customers engage ProServe virtually, there is always the potential that a customer might choose to include travel in their contract. Upon successful completion of the internship program, selected interns will receive a full-time offer to join the Professional Services and go into our AWS Technical training program. This program is an accelerated career development program for recent graduates and early career professionals entering technical roles to advance their skills and help customers design and build flexible and resilient cloud-based solutions. While in this program, you will learn key technical and professional skills from top AWS subject matter experts that you can use in your career working with AWS‚Äôs customers. [...] - Experience with software development lifecycle (SDLC) and agile/iterative methodologies  
- Knowledge of the primary AWS services such as EC2, ELB, RDS, VPC, Route53, and S3  
- Basic experience setting up cloud environment with AWS  
- Experience with infrastructure as code, ops automation, and configuration management tools such as Chef, Puppet, or Ansible
